DescriptionData.Title: Exercise Resistance Bands Set, Up To 100 Lbs Fitness Stretch Workout Bands Kit 11Pc With Fitness Tubes, For Home Gym Training Yoga Pilates
DescriptionData.Description:
★ Welcome to the home of LDXLR, we will show the best products and best service. Hope you have the best shopping experience and look forward to your visit.

-Are you sad because you can't exercise at home? Do you need a product to exercise without a gym?

-This fitness resistance band set allows you to feel like a gym anytime, anywhere. If you use it, you can exercise without restrictions. Different types of stretch bands can adapt to different muscle group exercises. Let your muscles gradually achieve the desired effect!
-High-quality products can even guarantee quality, safety and non-toxic, it must be suitable for you, so you can easily use it. As long as there is a person at home, you can train whole body. Its different weight exercise belt configurations can be used by everyone, such as your partner or your child.

★ Specifications
-Name: resistance band
-Material: TPE
-Resistance: 10 ~ 30 pounds
-Uses: beautiful legs, slimming, core training, strength training

★ Reminder:
-Due to manual measurement and different measurement tools, there may be subtle errors in the data.
-Due to different monitors, there may be slight color differences. Please refer to the actual product
-After-sales service: The design of the resistance band takes durability and quality into consideration, so you can rest assured. If the product does not meet or exceed your expectations, please contact us first, we will solve the problem within 24 hours.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ 【Resistance Band Full Body Exercise】 High quality standard fitness belt set 5 resistance bands made of natural latex tubes, you can use different pounds of resistance bands to train for your physical fitness. You can also use different pounds depending on the position in which you need to exercise.

★ 【Enjoy Fitness Anytime, Anywhere】 The simple design of the resistance band allows you to enjoy fitness anywhere in the house without being affected by the environment. You only need one person to exercise. The resistance band is easy to install, easy to use. You can use a door frame and a door latch as a fitness aid at home. If you lock it with foot and door locks, you can stretch your arms and body.

★ 【Applicable For Every Fitness Level】 Whether you are a beginner or an expert, these resistance bands are made for you. All muscles can be trained. The included straps and handles make these straps extremely different from the standard straps. With other accessories, multi-functional fitness purposes can be achieved.
★ 【Made From High Quality】Environmentally friendly that is extremely durable and the tapes will last a long time. Carefully constructed, safe for maximum pleasure and safety during training.

★【Satisfaction Guarantee】- Welcome to LDXLR's home. If the product does not meet or exceed your expectations, please contact us immediately. We will resolve this issue within 24 hours and hope our customers have the best shopping experience.
DescriptionData.SearchTerms: resistance bands fitness exercise loop workout pull up assist stretching strength training/conditioning physical therapy butt glute legs whole building gym training yoga pilates physiotherapy recovery non-slip skin-friendly coresteady set

DescriptionData.Title: Portable Exercise Resistance Band Set, Fitness Bands With 5 Fitness Tubes, Stretch Fitness Home Set Elastic Rope
DescriptionData.Description:
★ Welcome to the home of LDXLR, we will show the best products and best service. Hope you have the best shopping experience and look forward to your visit.

-Are you sad because you can't exercise at home? Do you need a product to exercise without a gym?
-This fitness resistance band set allows you to feel like a gym anytime, anywhere. If you use it, you can exercise without restrictions. Different types of stretch bands can adapt to different muscle group exercises. Let your muscles gradually achieve the desired effect!

★ Specifications
[Product name]; pull rope suit
[Product Material]; TPE
[Product size]; The length of the pull rope is 1.2 meters, the total length is 1.5 meters
[Rally parameters]; yellow 8 lbs. Green 15 lbs. Red 20 lbs. Blue 25 lbs. Black 30 lbs
[Suitable for the crowd]; men, women and children

★ Reminder:
-Due to manual measurement and different measurement tools, there may be subtle errors in the data.
-Due to different monitors, there may be slight color differences. Please refer to the actual product
-After-sales service: The design of the resistance band takes durability and quality into consideration, so you can rest assured. If the product does not meet or exceed your expectations, please contact us first, we will solve the problem within 24 hours.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ DISFRUTE DE LA APTITUD EN CUALQUIER MOMENTO, EN CUALQUIER LUGAR - ¿No tiene mucho tiempo? Ya sea en casa, en la oficina o de vacaciones, con las bandas de tubo en forma, ahora es posible entrenar en cualquier momento y en cualquier lugar.

★ SISTEMA DE ENTRENAMIENTO DE CUERPO COMPLETO: cada conjunto incluye correas para el tobillo, agarres para las manos y un ancla de la puerta que hace que sea más fácil apuntar a diferentes grupos musculares, incluidos los bíceps y tríceps, espalda y hombros, pecho y piernas, o abdominales duros.

★ CUALQUIERA DE SU FAMILIA PUEDE OBTENERLO: el uso a largo plazo puede ayudar a aliviar el estrés, mejorar la salud del cuerpo, estimular la circulación sanguínea, perder peso e incluso ayudar con muchos problemas de rehabilitación. Nuestras bandas de entrenamiento son de diferentes tamaños y adecuadas para mujeres, hombres, niños y ancianos. Puede entrenar con su familia en cualquier lugar, en cualquier momento.

★ SEGURIDAD SIEMPRE ENTRENA CON: las bandas de entrenamiento están hechas de TPE para que pueda concentrarse en sus sesiones de entrenamiento con facilidad y, por lo tanto, sean particularmente resistentes a las rasgaduras. Además, las piezas de conexión se cosen extra fuerte, lo que evita que se rompan los ojales.

★ GARANTÍA DE SATISFACCIÓN: Bienvenido a la casa de LDXLR. Si el producto no cumple o supera sus expectativas, contáctenos de inmediato. Resolveremos este problema dentro de las 24 horas y esperamos que nuestros clientes tengan la mejor experiencia de compra.

DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ FULL BODY WORKOUT SYSTEM - Each set includes ankle straps, hand grips, and a door anchor that make it easier to target different muscle groups, including biceps and triceps, back and shoulders, chest and legs, or rock-hard abdominals.

★ APPLICABLE FOR EVERY FITNESS LEVEL - Whether you are a beginner or an expert, these resistance bands are made for you. All muscles can be trained. The included straps and handles make these straps extremely different from the standard straps. With other accessories, multi-functional fitness purposes can be achieved.
★ GYM IN YOUR POCKE - Put these resistance bands in pocket or the lovely black carrying pouch then you would own a potable gym. These lightweight bands could let you do exercise wherever you want.
★ IDEA FOR ALL WORKOUTS - Our versatile workout bands for women, men and children can be used in your cross-fit, Pilates, yoga,beach body and even dance and ballet routines to get integrated.
